text:
- I'm Richa, I'm the
customer solution leader

for financial services and
media and entertainment,
based out of New York.

- I'm Andy K., a CSM
based out of New York.

- We are all about helping our
customers finding solutions.
We're the path finders that work backwards
from end customers, aligning technology
and business to generate business outcomes
through innovation and proven mechanisms.

- CSMs are strategic
advisors to our customers.

We offer perspective upon
realizing business value,
and organization transformations.

As such, we form long-term
strategic relationships.

- Being a CSM is great,
because we get to go
from strategic advisor to actually being
hands on on executing the very vision
that we've put together.
- We are the voice of the customer.

We're not selling,
instead, we're focused on
making our customers successful.

That means identifying
and removing blockers,

and plugging in the right
resources to do the right job.
Our team really enjoys working here

because of the collaborative
team environment,
and they get to develop their skills.
Team members play to their strengths,
and drive amazing customer outcomes.

- We're excited to see
what the team can achieve

for the customer, working
together with AWS.

We're always looking for
new members of the team
who offer a deep dive perspective
that can accelerate us to the next stage.
(upbeat music)
